name: Last Sea
description:
Made for Ludum-dare 36:

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-36/?action=preview&uid=57016

You are a Hunter sent to Last Sea, a place where strange objects have fallen from the sky during the night.

After getting yourself in a boat, you'll travel across the waters of a dangerous place.

---

Used C++ / SFML.
I joined the competition a bit late, but i tried my best to make something playable on time, feels incomplete, but learned a few things from this.

Still not sure about fitting the theme.
---

Didn't have the chance to test it on another PC. I'll do it soon.

Thanks for playing/reading
